modName: SAWS - Skyrim Armor and Weapon Sets
summary: Extending Skyrim\'s weapons and armors for people who play past level 30.
descriptionHtml:
Important: Nothing is replaced by this mod. This mod deals solely with creating new weapon/armor sets.

Introduction
------------------
By the time you hit level 50 there are no new armors or weapons for you to discover. Yet, there\'s another 30 levels available. This mod attempts to fill that space by expanding on existing armors/weapons and adding new sets.

Details
------------
Each existing armor/weapon set is expanded into 5 incremented armors/weapons.
For example:
Steel Armor is now called Nordic Armor.
There\'s 5 variations: bronze, steel, silver, skyforge steel, and ebony.

More details here (Spreadsheet alert!):
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0Asn_xSoWvSindDNVN0VST0VVNHZMWENkWm1jZ2dTemc

Installation
---------------
For the teasers:
1. Download the file.
2. Unzip the file to your skyrim/data folder.
3. Start the skyrim launcher, click data files, make sure the esp is ticked.
4. Start the game, the wolf armor is available at the tanning rack and the obsidian armor is available to forge if you have the Glass Smithing perk.

De-installation
-------------------
For the wolf fur teaser:
1. Delete Wolf Fur.esp
2. Delete meshes/clothing/fur/wolf folder
3. Delete textures/clothing/fur/wolf folder

For the obsidian teaser:
1. Delete Obsidian Set.esp
2. Delete meshes/armor/obsidian folder
3. Delete meshes/weapons/obsidian folder
4. Delete textures/armor/obsidian
5. Delete textures/weapons/obsidian

History
----------
1/7/2012 - Created Page and uploaded wolf fur teaser
1/8/2012 - Uploaded obsidian armor teaser based off Diranar\'s black glass texture
Known Issues
------------------
For the wolf fur teaser:
None of the inventory previews updated. No clue why.
Also at least the helmet didn\'t update to the proper mesh/texture. Again not sure why.
author: satsujinka and tek5828
